\" Relation Memory Network \" ( RMN ).from sentence: Our proposed model , " Relation Memory Network " ( RMN ) , is able to find complex relation even when a lot of information is given .

RN 's MLP - based output feature map.from sentence: In other words , RMN inherits RN 's MLP - based output feature map on Memory Network architecture .

relevant information.from sentence: It uses MLP to find out relevant information with a new generalization which simply erase the information already used .
